data.name: PreviewPage.ComponentOneControlPane.Label.Text
data.comment: Label text for the ComponentOne control selection pane, identifying the C1 Schedule control.

data.name: PreviewPage.ViewCulturesPane.Label.Text
data.comment: Title text for the culture selection pane within the Preview page.

data.name: PreviewPage.ViewCulturePane.CustomAddedCultures.Label.Text
data.comment: Label text for the list box or section displaying cultures that have been manually added by the user.

data.name: PreviewPage.ViewCulturePane.OveridenCultures.Label.Text
data.comment: Label text for the list of cultures whose default resources have been overridden with custom translations.

data.name: PreviewPage.ViewCulturePane.PreSupportedCultures.Label.Text
data.comment: Label text for the list of cultures that are supported by ComponentOne controls by default.

data.name: Form.TopNavigationBar.Heading.Title.VerticalBar
data.comment: A vertical bar character used as a visual separator in the application's top navigation header.

data.name: ViewSourcePage.ResourceViewerPane.Label.Text
data.comment: Title for the pane that displays the contents of resource files.

data.name: ViewSourcePage.ProjectDirectoryViewerPane.Label.Text
data.comment: Title for the pane that displays the project's file and directory structure.

data.name: ViewSourcePage.LocalizationGuidePane.Label.Text
data.comment: Section header label for the guide containing localization instructions.

data.name: ViewSourcePage.LocalizationGuidePane.Title.Text
data.comment: Main heading title for the entire localization guide section on the View Source page.

data.name: ViewSourcePage.LocalizationGuidePane.Intro.Description.Text
data.value: Follow the steps below to add and customize localization resources:
data.comment: Introductory text that precedes the step-by-step instructions in the localization guide.

data.name: ViewSourcePage.LocalizationGuidePane.ResourceFiles.Title.Text
data.comment: Section title introducing the topic of resource files, accompanied by a folder icon emoji.

data.name: ViewSourcePage.LocalizationGuidePane.ResourceFiles.Bullet1.Text
data.value: All localization resource files are available in the official GitHub repository.
data.comment: First bullet point stating the location of the original resource files.

data.name: ViewSourcePage.LocalizationGuidePane.ResourceFiles.Bullet2.Text
data.value: Each ComponentOne control (e.g., C1 Schedule, FlexGrid, FlexChart) includes culture-specific .resx files.
data.comment: Second bullet point explaining that each control has its own set of localizable resource files.

data.name: ViewSourcePage.LocalizationGuidePane.ResourceFiles.Example.Label.Text
data.comment: Label text used to introduce an example filename.

data.name: ViewSourcePage.LocalizationGuidePane.ResourceFiles.Example.FileName.Text
data.comment: An example resource file name for the C1Schedule control's English strings.

data.name: ViewSourcePage.LocalizationGuidePane.CustomLocalization.Title.Text
data.comment: Section title for the custom localization steps, accompanied by a tool emoji.

data.name: ViewSourcePage.LocalizationGuidePane.CustomLocalization.Step1.Text
data.value: Copy the existing .resx file from GitHub.
data.comment: Step 1 instruction: Duplicate a base resource file to use as a starting point.

data.name: ViewSourcePage.LocalizationGuidePane.CustomLocalization.Step2.Text
data.value: Rename it using the desired culture code (e.g. fr for French).
data.comment: Step 2 instruction: Rename the copied file to match the target culture's naming convention.

data.name: ViewSourcePage.LocalizationGuidePane.CustomLocalization.Example.Label.Text
data.comment: Label text used to introduce an example of a culture-specific filename.

data.name: ViewSourcePage.LocalizationGuidePane.CustomLocalization.Example.FileName.Text
data.comment: An example of a correctly renamed resource file for French culture.

data.name: ViewSourcePage.LocalizationGuidePane.CustomLocalization.Step3.Text
data.value: Edit the resource file and replace values with translated text.
data.comment: Step 3 instruction: Localize the content by translating the string values in the resource file.

data.name: ViewSourcePage.LocalizationGuidePane.FinalStep.Title.Text
data.comment: Section title for the final instructions, accompanied by a checkmark emoji.

data.name: ViewSourcePage.LocalizationGuidePane.FinalStep.Bullet1.Text
data.value: Add the modified file to your project.
data.comment: First final step: Integrate the new culture resource file into the project.

data.name: ViewSourcePage.LocalizationGuidePane.FinalStep.Bullet2.Text
data.value: The control will automatically detect and use your custom localization.
data.comment: Second final step: Explains that the ComponentOne control will automatically use the new resources.

data.name: Form.TopNavigationBar.ToggleButton.PreviewLabel.Text
data.comment: Text for the navigation button that switches the application view to the Preview page.

data.name: Form.TopNavigationBar.Heading.Title.Text
data.comment: The main title text displayed in the application's top navigation bar.

data.name: Form.TopNavigationBar.ToggleButton.ViewSourceLabel.Text
data.comment: Text for the navigation button that switches the application view to the View Source page.

data.name: Form.TopNavigationBar.Heading.ComponentOneTitle.Text
data.comment: Brand name 'Component One' displayed in the top navigation bar.
